bug.author: coatless
bug.description:
When pulling from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/ensmallen/blob/master/HISTORY.md>HISTORY.md</denchmark-link> , the release notes:
miss the "code name" that can be found in ensmallen.hpp and GitHub release page. miss hard links to the PR, e.g. #86 -> [#86](https://github.com/mlpack/ensmallen/pull/86)
Would it be possible to always include these components?

comments.comment: Oh, I see, that's easy enough to do. Let me manually make those changes now. I don't think it's worth issuing 1.16.1 with just changes to HISTORY.md, but we can make sure that happens in the future. Does that sound good?
Sounds good! I agree, there is no need to release these history changes as 1.16.1.

Fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/ensmallen/pull/125>#125</denchmark-link> . I'll make sure that HISTORY.md follows this format in the future. To make your life easier, should we do this for mlpack also?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rcurtin>@rcurtin</denchmark-link> I'm not sure how important that would be as the bridge relies on the system-specific version of installed whereas the package distributes the header-only library.
Ah, got it, thanks for the clarification. üëç
